name: The Tail of the Everlasting Yarn
name_original: The Tail of the Everlasting Yarn
description:
The Tail of the Everlasting Yarn by The Bootleg Buccaneers

Trailer Music Link: https://soundcloud.com/conor-powers-stout/tail-of-the-everlasting-yarn

 Agent Furball is sent on a mission down to Earth in hopes of recovering the Space Cat's most prized possession, one massive ball of yarn. 

Controls:

W to move up

S to move down

D to move right

A to move left

Space bar to jump, double tap for double jump

Left Mouse Button or J to Punch

Right Mouse Button or K to Fire Blaster

Left Shift to Sprint

The game features a combat system that allows for the comboing of abilites: for example Sprint+Punch = DashPunch which can be followed up with blaster fire that Uppercuts the enemy into the air allowing for additional powerful combos.
